article_title: Why Nearly All Consumers Should Open an HSA Account
article_text:
Rising Rate CDs Are Not the Best Option for Growth-Seeking Investors

Get real: rising rate CDs are not always the best choice for investors who are seeking to stash their cash in a liquid investment because other options generate better yields.

article_metadata.description: As deductibles for health insurance plans continue their upward trend even for employer-sponsored options, most consumers are choosing plans that supersede the minimum requirement to open a health savings account.
article_metadata.author: Ellen Chang

og.description: As deductibles for health insurance plans continue their upward trend even for employer-sponsored options, most consumers are choosing plans that supersede the minimum requirement to open a health savings account.
